author: Andreas J. Resch
comment: The interface is very intuitive, but on some occasions one can not see the placed bet. Unfortunately the calculations have some bugs. For instance one loses the placed bet, when the app is exited. Or even if you win a little, you end up with less money than you started with. But still it's a lot of fun and astoundingly good for a watch game.

reply.author: Dolce Games
reply.content: We are currently looking into this.  Thank you.

title: Excellent interface, but math is off

author: Garret Glascock
comment: Fun to play, a nice way to the pass time as you can start or stop when ever you want. My only complaint is I cannot split. Perhaps the watch face is not big enough for the gesture to work? Please change the gesture! Double down works fine, cannot double down.

reply.author: Dolce Games
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback.  We are currently working on the bugs.

title: Very cool

comment: As simple as it is, a lot of thought has gone into this game, to adapt it to the unique interface and input of a "smart" watch as precisely as possible... And the developer has done a spectacular job (though I do wonder why one's bet only shows some of the time - this is a confusing design flaw!). Blackjack Wear looks fantastic, it's easy to use, works flawlessly and most importantly, it's plenty of fun! Very highly recommended, for all users of Android Wear "smart" watches.

reply.author: Dolce Games
reply.content: Thank you - We're glad you are enjoying the game.  Thanks for the input as well.

title: Winner winner, chicken dinner!

author: Antony Mouse
comment: OK so with the newest update the app runs on the 360. It takes a while to get used to the swipes. They are short-distance swipes, not from the edge of the screen. But anyways, fun way to kill a few minutes here and there.
title: Moto 360

author: Matt Uy
comment: Running on a Huawei watch, the hole card's right side is shown partially revealing the hole card before the player stays. Also the split and double gestures are prone to mistakes please just include buttons when opportunity is present. Stay and hit function well
title: Hole card showing glitch graphics

author: Chase Johnson
comment: game is good. Minor flaws like always resets bet to 5 no matter if change settings or previous bet. Sometimes can't even see how much you bet at all. Also Aces should be either 1 or 11 but game often counts as 0.

author: taylor stern
comment: I can get to the first part of the gamr but i can not perform actions like hit hold and fold i have a moto 360 please fix
title: Cant do any thing

author: David Wilson
comment: Nothing special here, lacks details of the game making the playing experience boring.  This app needs more accurate action moves for a real game.
title: Unable to double down and split

author: Lee Weaver
comment: Split function doesnt work, doesn't always show how much you're betting, doesnt always count cards when they come out. Apart from that i love it. If you could spend earnings on items (card tables, cards, drinks (allows you to get loans from loan sharks when you bottom out), membership to high rollers club (allows you to a 'private room' where bets are raised 100 credits at a time), consumable pistol (allows you to survive not paying a loan shark in time which is game over). I would pay for this.
title: Really like it but buggy.

author: Wendy Y
comment: Running on a Moto 360 Gen 2. Shows opponents cards periodically, doesn't count cards correctly at times, and the one that kills me the most is it deducts coins as if you lost no matter the outcome of the game. You lost? No big deal, we'll take the chips. You won? We're gonna take 15 chips from you anyway.
title: Incredibly buggy, almost unplayable.

author: Omar Ramos
comment: This is a great game but if you can add different color chips so that i don't have to click my watch so many times you will get 4 stars. Also like a previous person stated if you can fix the split cards function then this will be a 5 star app.
title: Please update color chips and split function.

author: Martin Buss
comment: Or im bad at. Blackjack! Fun well fesigned input methods....read the tutirial!!
title: Fun....but I think It cheats lol

author: Mari velazquez
comment: psss... it works. its not like im trying to play a professional game at a casino. nor i deliberately get my watch and search for this game. but when i dont have my phone and i wanna seem cool/kill some time its freakin perfect.
title: it works

author: Timothy F.
comment: Fun to play, but the wager math is off.  If I bet five and lose, I lose ten.  If I bet five and win, I don't gain any chips.  If I bet five and push, I lose five.  Would be a 4 star, but math issue drops it down.
title: Wager math is off

author: N Ibbo
comment: Am I missing something? On a moto 360 there does not seem to be a way to twist stick or anything.
title: Not working

author: Frank Tedesco
comment: Doesn't add dealer's hand correctly. Been an error since first released. Really?
title: Downgraded to 3 stars

author: Matthew Wied
comment: The split function does not work.  Would be great if double tap could be added for split.
title: Asus zenwatch

author: Brandon Marks
comment: Fix this bug on lg g watch and its 5 stars
title: Split function doesnt work!

author: Jeffrey Klassen
comment: This is a well made, fun blackjack game.  The gestures are great.  Wouldn't mind a swipe gesture for dealing the next hand.
title: Works great.

author: Harold Sohrweide
comment: When I double down it actually takes triple from my pot. And I have yet to be able to split.
title: Contains bugs

author: Mike McCafferty
comment: Does not tally winnings or losses correctly.
title: Math

author: Jorge Antonio Garza Peña
comment: Please remove the icon from the app drawer.
title: Good game. Missing split and double down function.

author: Katja DeCuir
comment: Never thought of playing cards on my watch. Pretty nice. Good work.
title: Pretty cool

author: shepard schiff
comment: Works, but buggy.

author: gareth holmes
comment: Simple and fun
title: Very nice

author: Brandon Lucas
comment: Great device game

author: dee phillips
comment: Yesssssss

author: Keivan Nadri
comment: Overview

author: Linda Matthews
comment: Moto 360

reply.author: Dolce Games
reply.content: New version just released to support Moto 360.

title: Crashes in round watches, retried and still crashes

author: John Matthews
comment: Crashes on Moto 360...uninstall
title: Round crashes

author: Ernst Gottschalk
comment: Doesnt work

reply.author: Dolce Games
reply.content: Please try the new version special release for Moto 360.

author: Joe Dunford
comment: Entertaining! On the tutorial it should say swipe down to hit, but great app!

author: William Cardoza
comment: Smooth. Simple. Sharp
title: Nice

author: William Neal
comment: Work on moto 360

reply.author: Dolce Games
reply.content: New version just released to support Moto 360, so it should work now.

title: Doesn't

author: Laquan W.
comment: Been trying for hour to sync this to my Moto 360 to no avail. What a waste of time. I guess that would be good if it worked.
title: Dose not work

author: Back Up
comment: Great idea, and I would love to have it work... No matter wether I win or lose that round, I always lose the pot... Don't really know what's going on..
title: Love it, but hate it

author: Mike Stevens
comment: Great format but very buggy. Things are not calculating right, and you can over bet to where your cash goes negative

author: Michael Khalil
comment: Force closes on the moto 360

reply.author: Dolce Games
reply.content: It should no longer force close on mote 360.  A new version just released.

title: No go on 360

author: Brian Bauer
comment: It's a fun game.
title: Like it
